mapper.select: select mr.apply_warehouse_code as warehouseCode ,mrd.materials_code as materialsCode ,sum(mrd.apply_num) as applyNum,sum(mrd.apply_num) as availableNum from material_requisition_detail mrd left join material_requisition mr on mrd.material_requisition_id = mr.id where mrd.del_flag = 0 and mr.del_flag = 0 and mr.fault_repair_record_id = #{faultRepairRecordId} group by mr.apply_warehouse_code,mrd.materials_code
